title: 7.3 Master Challenge 3
question: Create a DataFrame of the population of France and Italy from the year 1960 to 2020. Generate a time series object for both datasets. Perform a forecast for the next 30 years using an ExponentialSmoothing model. Compare the forecasted population trends of both countries and draw meaningful inferences from them.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - scratch - javascript - R - pseudocode - java
